pages.text: $(li)The Key is an Item that can be used to lock and open $(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/lock_block)Lock Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/safe)Safes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/netherite_door)Netherite Doors and Trapdoors$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can change its name in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l), to have multiple Keys.
pages.title: Key

pages.text: $(li)First right click one of this blocks while you are holding a Key on your hand.$(br)$(li)Now you will be able to interact with the Key with the same name that you used to lock it right clicking while you are holding that Key on your hand.$(br)$(li)To unbind a key simply shift click with it on it's safe.$(br)$(li)This key can be placed in your bubbles inventory too.
